name: Makis Adventure
storyline:
A long time ago, the three sacred sharks ensured peace in the land. They were the strongest creatures
and protected the islanders from evil demons. However, when they were about to die, they looked for
worthy descendants to pass on their power. Since only other shark-demons were possible descendants,
Maki and Temu were chosen. Both received one shark tooth from each of the three sacred sharks,
which was believed to be the source of their power. This shark tooth allowed Maki and Temu to transform into their shark-form. After the death of the 3 holy sharks, it remained calm and peaceful for a while.
However, when a strong storm caused the gate to the underworld to break open, Octo, the king of evil demons, managed to get to the upper world. He terrorized the islanders and destroyed entire islands to show off his power. Maki and Temu saw themselves as protectors and faced Octo in a great fight. Unfortunetly, they failed to defeat Octo. Octo stole their shark teeth and imprisoned them in his prison(Here the game starts for the player: Maki wakes up in his prison cell)
Maki and Temu must escape the prison and recover their shark teeth guarded by Octo's Strongest subservients. Maki must travel all 3 dungeon islands and get his shark tooth back. At the End of the adventure, Maki faces Octo again and there is a final fight
summary: Makis Adventure is an Action- Platformer with shark demons. Fight, dash, swim and bite your way through 3 different dungeons. Let the inner shark out! Face many different opponents and defeat powerful bosses.
